entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-09-06
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Create a new documentation page elaborating on various Data Protection error messages #50560
    .NET 9 Planning
  • Introduce a Shared DynamicObject for Cross-Controller Data Exchange #50559
  • Content Disposition header generate invalid filename when semicolon is present #50557
  • Add support to Virtualize.ItemsProvider for partial updates #50555
    Discussions
  • HttpRequestHeaders Keys.Contains is not case insensitive, whereas HttpDictionary is #50553
  • [Blazor] Remove obsolete APIs #50548
    9.0-preview1
  • set serialization method for specific controllers #50540
  • Potentially unsound trimming suppression in DefaultAntiforgeryStateProvider #50536
    Backlog

Closed

  • HTTPS certificate exact match using Issuer's SimpleName instead of Certificate's #49062
    9.0-preview1
  • Add aka.ms links to data protection warnings #22029
    .NET 8 Planning
  • Update jquery-validation dependency in templates to the latest version #50421
    8.0-rc2
  • NSwag.AspNetCore instead of Swashbuckle.AspNetCore #50133
    Discussions
  • QuickGrid does not support 'record'-based objects #50534
  • CascadingTypeParameter aliases #50544
  • StaticHtmlRenderer escapes apostrophes/quotes unnecessarily, breaking script blocks #49797
    8.0-rc2
  • Expose AccessTokenResponse from the new BearerToken AuthenticatonHandler #49424
    8.0-rc2
  • Aspnetcore server check websocket connection status wrong. #50515
  • Blazor Server-Side Rendering CORS issue with Microsoft.Identity.Web & Azure B2C #49814
    8.0-rc2
  • Blazor WebAssembly misinterprets Content-Type on wasm file, uses slow ArrayBuffer instantiation #49621
    8.0-rc2
  • Blazor SSR - can't wrap layout Body with interactive component #50518
  • Two forms on same page results in null ref #49821
    8.0-rc2
  • Synchronous operations are disallowed. Call WriteAsync or set AllowSynchronousIO to true instead. #50529
  • .NET 8 Preview 7 - Possible form handling regression Blazor SSR #49965
    8.0-rc2
  • Request Delegate Generator fails to compile code with CS8601 warning for required non-nullable record parameters #49381
    8.0-rc2
  • FromQueryAttribute with Name does not work when added to property of an object with AsParametersAttribute #50408
    8.0-rc2

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/8.0] [Blazor] Dynamically toggle navigation interception #50564
    area-blazor
  • [release/8.0] [Blazor] Support injecting keyed services with `[Inject]` #50561
    area-blazor
  • [release/8.0] Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 1159: Build ID 2261203 #50558
    area-infrastructure, area-mvc, tell-mode
  • Update Blazor WebAssembly template #50554
    area-blazor
  • Enhanced navigation redirections. Make form enhancement opt-in. #50551
    area-blazor
  • [Blazor] Error page support for Server Side Rendered Razor Component Applications #50550
    area-blazor
  • [Blazor] Obsolete Router.PreferExactMatches #50545
    area-blazor
  • Update help link and aka.ms references for RDG #50542
    feature-rdg, area-minimal
  • Update Microsoft.IdentityModel to 7.0.0-preview5 #50538
    area-infrastructure
  • Support resolving IFormFile in complex form mapping #50537
    area-blazor

Merged

  • Update CertificateLoader.cs #50474
    community-contribution, area-networking, 9.0-preview1
  • Tidy up aka.ms links in data protection error messages #50465
    area-dataprotection, 8.0-rc2
  • Revert "[Blazor] Update selenium versions" #50556
    area-infrastructure, 8.0-rc2
  • [release/7.0] Update jquery-validation to v1.19.5 #50483
    area-infrastructure, area-ui-rendering, 7.0.12
  • [release/6.0] Update jquery-validation to v1.19.5 #50484
    area-infrastructure, area-mvc, 6.0.23
  • Fix grammar in doc comments (a vs an) #50552
    area-mvc, community-contribution, area-web-frameworks, 9.0-preview1
  • [release/8.0] Update jquery-validation to v1.19.5 #50482
    area-ui-rendering, 8.0-rc2

Updated

  • Try Adding Suport for XForwardedPort #50338
    community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, area-networking
  • Fix IIS OutOfProc sometimes creating multiple app instances after recycle #50535
    feature-iis, area-networking
  • SignalR MessageBuffer fixes #50315
    area-signalr
  • [release/8.0] Add feature to expose IIS hosting details #50443
    area-networking
  • Increment HubProtocol version for Stateful Reconnect #50442
    area-signalr
  • Fix incoming connections with same ID sometimes failing incorrectly #50417
    area-signalr
  • Fix dropping messages on reconnect #50409
    area-signalr, pending-ci-rerun
  • Document the coupling between KestrelServerLimits and *TransportOptions #50468
    area-networking
  • WIP: Add automated Blazor WebView test using Photino #50347
    area-blazor, pending-ci-rerun
  • Add SetBrowserRequestStreamingEnabled extension method #50481
    area-blazor, community-contribution, 9.0-preview1
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 1159: Build ID 2261203 #49575
    area-mvc
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0' => 'main' #50530
    area-infrastructure, Type: Merge Forward :fast_forward:
  • [Blazor] Form mapping support for select multiple, logging, DataMember and other improvements/cleanups #50431
    area-blazor
  • Make IEmailSender more customizable #50301
    area-identity, pending-ci-rerun
  • Split redis output-cache pieces from Microsoft.Extensions.Caching.StackExchange.Redis into Microsoft.AspNetCore.OutputCaching.StackExchangeRedis #50457
    area-middleware
